isis.stitle: ALTERNATOR: DELCO-REMY 10-SI SERIES, TYPE 116 - REPAIR PROCEDURES - ROTOR FIELD WINDING CHECKS

svcproc.title: ROTOR FIELD WINDING CHECKS
svcproc.para: To check for opens, connect the ohmmeter to each slip ring ( Figure 5). If the ohmmeter reading is high (infinite), the winding is open.
Connect ohmmeter from one slip ring to the shaft. If the reading is low, the rotor winding is grounded.

The winding is checked for short-circuits or excessive resistance by connecting an ohmmeter to the two slip rings ( Figure 5). If the resistance reading is below the specified value, the winding is shorted; if above the specified value the winding has excessive resistance. The specified resistance value can be determined by dividing the voltage by the current given in SPECIFICATIONS .
If the rotor is not defective, but the generator fails to supply rated output, the defect is in the diode trio, rectifier bridge, stator, or regulator.
